mapper.select: SELECT x, y FROM temp.temp_gps WHERE car = #{carNum}
SELECT noise_level AS noiseLevel FROM temp.temp_noise WHERE car = #{carNum}
SELECT rpm_level AS rpmLevel FROM temp.temp_rpm WHERE car = #{carNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO public.coord (id, car, date, time, x, y, noise_level, rpm_level, geom, is_done) VALUES (nextval('local_sequence'), #{localData.car},#{localData.date},#{localData.time},#{localData.x},#{localData.y},#{localData.noiseLevel},#{localData.rpmLevel}, ST_SetSRID(ST_MakePoint(#{localData.x},#{localData.y}), 4326), #{localData.is_done})
INSERT INTO TEMP_GPS (id, car, date, time, x,y) VALUES ( nextval('temp_gps_sequence'), #{gtd.car}, #{gtd.date}, #{gtd.time}, #{gtd.x}, #{gtd.y})
INSERT INTO TEMP_NOISE (id, car, date, time, noise_level) VALUES ( nextval('temp_noise_sequence'), #{ntd.car}, #{ntd.date}, #{ntd.time}, #{ntd.noiseLevel})
INSERT INTO TEMP_RPM (id, car, date, time, rpm_level) VALUES ( nextval('temp_rpm_sequence'), #{rtd.car}, #{rtd.date}, #{rtd.time}, #{rtd.rpmLevel})
mapper.select: WITH min_max_times AS ( SELECT (SELECT time FROM coord WHERE date = TO_DATE(#{date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND car_num = #{carNum} ORDER BY time ASC LIMIT 1) AS min_time, (SELECT time FROM coord WHERE date = TO_DATE(#{date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND car_num = #{carNum} ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1) AS max_time ) SELECT max_time - min_time AS time_difference FROM min_max_times

with clean_avg as( select ( select count(*) from coord where date = TO_DATE(#{date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND car_num = #{carNum} ) as total, ( select count(*) from coord where date = TO_DATE(#{date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND car_num = #{carNum} and is_done = true ) as is_true ) select trunc((is_true::numeric/total::numeric*100),2) as cleanRatio from clean_avg
SELECT lon,lat, is_done FROM COORD WHERE DATE = TO_DATE(#{date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND CAR_NUM = #{carNum}

WITH date_coord AS ( SELECT (SELECT x FROM coord WHERE date = TO_DATE(#{date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND car_num = #{carNum} ORDER BY x ASC LIMIT 1) AS min_x, (SELECT x FROM coord WHERE date = TO_DATE(#{date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND car_num = #{carNum} ORDER BY x DESC LIMIT 1) AS max_x, (SELECT y FROM coord WHERE date = TO_DATE(#{date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND car_num = #{carNum} ORDER BY y ASC LIMIT 1) AS min_y, (SELECT y FROM coord WHERE date = TO_DATE(#{date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND car_num = #{carNum} ORDER BY y DESC LIMIT 1) AS max_y ) SELECT (max_x + min_x)/2 AS x, (max_y + min_y)/2 AS y FROM date_coord
